title: As scandal deepens, support for Shinzo Abe shrinks
text:
As scandal deepens, support for Shinzo Abe shrinks Monday, March 19, 2018 - 01:40 
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his popularity plunging amid a cronyism scandal, takes responsibility for a loss of trust in his government but denies he or his wife had intervened in a land sale to a school operator with ties to his wife.   
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his popularity plunging amid a cronyism scandal, takes responsibility for a loss of trust in his government but denies he or his wife had intervened in a land sale to a school operator with ties to his wife.  //reut.rs/2IAWTdf
